news.title: UN official says Israel expanding Gaza operations would risk 'catastrophic consequences'
news.summary: The UN's assistant secretary general says reports of the possible move are "deeply alarming".

news.title: RFK Jr cancels $500m in mRNA vaccine development in the US
news.summary: Since taking office, the vaccine sceptic has made a number of changes to how vaccines are regulated.

news.title: No bullying found in Harry charity row, but blame for all sides
news.summary: The Charity Commission criticises “all parties” at Sentebale for allowing a “damaging” dispute to play out publicly.

news.title: Oceangate's Titan whistleblower: 'People were sold a lie'
news.summary: A former Oceangate employee says he told US authorities about safety concerns with the sub before it imploded.

news.title: Hiroshima marks 80 years since atomic bombing
news.summary: Japan's leader Shigeru Ishiba and officials from across the world attended the annual ceremony in Hiroshima.

news.title: More than 100 missing after flash floods in India
news.summary: Many rescue teams have been unable to reach the area because of damaged roads and bad weather.

news.title: The Papers:  '£50bn black hole' and parental help from a princess
news.summary: Wednesday's papers lead on the next budget, with Chancellor Rachel Reeves under pressure to stick to her spending promises.

news.title: WhatsApp deletes over 6.8m accounts linked to scams worldwide, Meta says
news.summary: Many of the accounts were linked to criminal groups operating in South East Asia, the social media giant said.

news.title: Great Barrier Reef suffers worst coral decline on record
news.summary: Reefs have been battered by cyclones and starfish that eat coral, but heat stress driven by climate change is the main cause of damage.

news.title: Chinese nationals charged with exporting Nvidia AI chips to China
news.summary: Chuan Geng and Shiwei Yang are accused of exporting the chips from the US to China through Singapore and Malaysia.
